content: Const generics stalls a little again. (One week?) Personally i really wish its priority be lifted a little...

Right now the immediate problem is @eddyb not doing reviews.
If someone feels confident to review https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/58583 instead, then we'll make progress again.

@oli
Could you reassign it to yourself perhaps?
(Moreover, the last weeks multiple compiler team members are simultaneously busy and not reviewing, so the queue is moving into a bit sad state in general.)
Hopefully the remaining PRs for const generics will be much smaller and more amenable to review. Thanks for taking a look, @oli!
if anyone's familiar with infer, https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/59008 is up
